title: VR Environments for Collaborative Software Development

media:group.media:title: VR Environments for Collaborative Software Development
media:group.media:description:
In this podcast, Shane Hastie, Lead Editor for Culture & Methods spoke to Jonathan Schneider and the development team from Moderne about their experiences using an immersive VR environment for collaborative software development. 

This podcast was recorded as a video of the immersive experience.
